oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-11-17 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from November 17, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Marty Robbins (host/performer), guest performer Jimmy C. Newman, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Shorty Lavender, Del Wood, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones. Minnie Pearl mentions an 8-page spread in ""this week's Life magazine"". Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Rod Brasfield; Jimmy C. Newman; Grandpa Jones; Marty Robbins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Marty Robbins introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Rod Brasfield) -- Marty Robbins introduces Jimmy C. Newman -- Honky Tonk Tears (Jimmy C. Newman) -- Marty Robbins introduces Grandpa Jones -- It's Raining Here This Morning (Grandpa Jones) -- Marty Robbins talks -- Singing The Blues (Marty Robbins) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Marty Robbins) -- Cavalier Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Wood, Del; Lavender, Shorty; Robbins, Marty; Newman, Jimmy C.
